entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:34 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 0.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain changing to light snow in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
